DataElement.preferredDefinition: A textual description of the procedures performed for building a collection of double stranded DNA fragments flanked by oligonucleotide sequence adapters to enable their analysis by high-throughput sequencing.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A collection of double stranded DNA fragments flanked by oligonucleotide sequence adapters to enable their analysis by high-throughput sequencing.:Methods for building collections of cloned DNA consisting of DNA copies of all the mRNAs produced by a cell type.  cDNAs are generated using reverse transcriptase and either an oligo-dT or random primer.  The copies are inserted into a bacterial plasmid or bacteriophage vector.  The library can be maintained as a pooled population or as an arrayed library._A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A collection of double stranded DNA fragments flanked by oligonucleotide sequence adapters to enable their analysis by high-throughput sequencing.

Concepts.definition: A collection of double stranded DNA fragments flanked by oligonucleotide sequence adapters to enable their analysis by high-throughput sequencing.

The copies are inserted into a bacterial plasmid or bacteriophage vector.  The library can be maintained as a pooled population or as an arrayed library._A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.

Concepts.definition: Methods for building collections of cloned DNA consisting of DNA copies of all the mRNAs produced by a cell type.  cDNAs are generated using reverse transcriptase and either an oligo-dT or random primer.  The copies are inserted into a bacterial plasmid or bacteriophage vector.  The library can be maintained as a pooled population or as an arrayed library.
A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
